txt.en: 'I believe the valves can be used to control the device and how much smoke it sends into these tunnels.'
'We took this mountain back from Smaug an age ago. It shall not belong to anyone but a dwarf.'
'Tear down the pipes, smash the valves, and destroy the furnace before it destroys us all.'
'A machine of war, fueled by an ancient grim, and built to smoke us out of the mountain.'
'But the smoke isn't your normal camp-fire variety. It's strange, filled with noxious vapours from foul concoctions.'
'Neither we, nor the ravens, will last long against it.'
As the Fire-tender falls, the grim roars to life!
As the grim goes dark, a Fire-tender approaches!
'Curse those dastardly Easterlings. I do not think they will stop until we are all in our graves.'
'And I fear that infernal device is going to send us there.'
